metadata.title: CVE-2021-29338 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Integer Overflow in OpenJPEG v2.4.0 allows remote attackers to crash theapplication, causing a Denial of Service (DoS). This occurs when theattacker uses the command line option "-ImgDir" on a directory thatcontains 1048576 files.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
insighttoolkit4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').

blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
